title: Textile, late 18th–early 19th century
description: Red and white in a stripe pattern with small foliage decoration crossed by a branching leaf and flower. A large leaf, pointed and with scalloped edge and interior decoration forms part of the pattern.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, late 18th–early 19th century.
late 18th–early 19th century. Medium: cotton
Technique: copperplate printed. Gift of Harold M. Bailey. 1960-79-15-b.
